alert.note: Alert for Debeque to Silt Corridor; Gore and Elk Mountains, Central Mountain Valleys; Grand and Battlement Mesas; Roan and Tavaputs Plateaus (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS GrandJunction (Western Colorado and Eastern Utah)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 28 at 4:50PM MDT by NWS GrandJunction
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of south central Garfield County through 515 PM MDT... At 449 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Rifle, moving east at 15 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Use caution if traveling with light and high profile vehicles. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Rifle around 500 PM MDT. Other locations in the path of this storm include Silt. This includes the following highways... Interstate 70 in Colorado between mile markers 81 and 102. Colorado 13 between mile markers 1 and 12. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Debeque to Silt Corridor; Gore and Elk Mountains, Central Mountain Valleys; Grand and Battlement Mesas; Roan and Tavaputs Plateaus
